1370: Katerina was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.

Gave birth to Katerina in 1370 at age 19.
Lost daughter Katerina when Katerina was 1 years old.

1382: Gave birth to Weitijn in 1382 at age 31.
1383: Gave birth to Michiel in 1383 at age 32.
1384: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1384 at age 33.
1386: Lost son Reynerus when Reynerus was 0 years old.
